description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Damage, and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.

description.short: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for +Status Protection
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the slotted power a chance to boost your status protection against hold, disorient, sleep, immobilize, confuse and terrorize effects for a short time, and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 3 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.
